author: clemon1222
content: Is there a good set of documentations or design document that is a good jumping off point to understanding the current state of epbs? Was hoping to get a better high level overview before I dive into some of the existing code.

author: potuz
content: I think the most comprehensive while somewhat high level is still this. https://hackmd.io/uWVGcvcKSoqS4P5c5NHG3g The first second describes the block's timeline which is the important change. You can ignore things about payload boosts and witheld messages as those are about to change tomorrow actually

author: clemon1222
content: awesome thanks! I'm guessing this and the breakout rooms are where the most up to date content and convo normally takes place?

author: potuz
content: the breakout room will be quite empty for a few weeks, tomorrow we have another call, but there's nothing really to report. I'll just update on the actual changes I planned for the CL spec to have it actualized this weekend. After doing that will prepare a new design doc for new implementers I think
